data.comment: The match is underway in Eibar.
In Eibar Elche drive forward through Lucas Boye. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 2, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Eibar throw-in in Elche's half.
Eibar pushes forward through Anaitz Arbilla, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Eibar.
In the minute 4, Santiago Jaime Latre awards the away team a throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Eibar to check on Recio, who is grimacing with pain.
Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Eibar's Recio looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to Elche.
Can Elche capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Eibar's half?
In the minute 8, Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Eibar's half?
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Elche.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Alvaro Tejero (Eibar) has received a yellow card from Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Elche in the half of Eibar.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
Throw-in for Elche at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Elche in the half of Eibar.
Throw-in for Eibar at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Eibar.
In the minute 14, Eibar's Pedro Leon is on target but unsuccessful.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In Eibar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Elche at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Elche.
In the minute 19, Throw-in high up the field for Elche in Eibar.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 21, Elche needs to be cautious. Eibar have an attacking throw-in.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a throw-in for Eibar, close to Elche's area.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 22, Eibar to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
Free kick Eibar.
Elche have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, In Eibar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jose Luis Mendilibar is making the team's first substitution at Ipurua Municipal Stadium with Sergio Alvarez replacing Recio.
Can Eibar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
In the minute 26, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Eibar.
Yoshinori Muto (Eibar) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Eibar's Takashi Inui misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the away team in Eibar.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Elche throw-in in Eibar's half.
Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Eibar in the half of Elche.
Tete Morente (Elche) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Elche.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
In the minute 33, Eibar's Takashi Inui gets in a shot on goal at Ipurua Municipal Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Lucas Boye.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
Elche have a dangerous throw-in.
Eibar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eibar's Kevin Rodrigues breaks free at Ipurua Municipal Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Elche a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Josan (Elche) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 41, Elche to take a throw-in in Eibar territory.
Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Elche's Lucas Boye is whistled for offside at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
In the minute 44, Eibar attack but Pedro Leon's header doesn't find the target.
Elche have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
The first-half is over at Ipurua Municipal Stadium.
